name: messaging-scheduling-hardening
description: Messaging scheduling hardening — stale recovery, timeout, one-time jobs, InMemory storage, execution purge, scheduling-only mode, compiled delegates, misfire strategy, health checks, cron config override

userStories.title: Add ReleaseStaleJobsAsync to IScheduledJobStorage
userStories.description: Add Task<int> ReleaseStaleJobsAsync(TimeSpan staleness, CancellationToken) to IScheduledJobStorage. Returns count of released jobs. XML docs.
acceptanceCriteria: ReleaseStaleJobsAsync method added to IScheduledJobStorage interface
Returns count of released jobs
XML docs explain staleness threshold semantics

userStories.title: Add PurgeExecutionsAsync to IScheduledJobStorage
userStories.description: Add Task<int> PurgeExecutionsAsync(TimeSpan retention, CancellationToken) to IScheduledJobStorage. Deletes completed executions older than retention. Returns count. Manual-only — consumers call this from their own code or scheduled job (no automatic background purge).
acceptanceCriteria: PurgeExecutionsAsync method added to IScheduledJobStorage
Deletes execution records with CompletedAt older than now - retention
Returns count of purged records

userStories.title: Add Timeout support to RecurringAttribute and ScheduledJob
userStories.description: Add TimeoutSeconds (int, default 0) to RecurringAttribute and Timeout (TimeSpan?) to ScheduledJob. Carry timeout from attribute to job during reconciliation.
acceptanceCriteria: TimeoutSeconds property (default 0 = no timeout) on RecurringAttribute
Timeout (TimeSpan?) property on ScheduledJob entity
ScheduledJobDefinition carries timeout from attribute to job during reconciliation

userStories.title: Add ScheduleOnceAsync to IScheduledJobManager
userStories.notes: Type reference approach (Hangfire/Quartz pattern). No pre-registration required. Consumer resolved at runtime via keyed DI lookup, fallback to ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance.
userStories.description: Add ScheduleOnceAsync(name, runAt, consumerType, payload?, ct) to IScheduledJobManager. Creates OneTime ScheduledJob with NextRunTime=runAt. Consumer resolved at runtime via keyed DI or ActivatorUtilities fallback — no pre-registration needed (same pattern as Hangfire/Quartz.NET). Stores consumerType assembly-qualified name in job metadata for runtime resolution.
acceptanceCriteria: ScheduleOnceAsync added to IScheduledJobManager interface
Creates ScheduledJob with Type=OneTime, NextRunTime=runAt, Status=Pending
Stores consumer Type assembly-qualified name in ScheduledJob for runtime resolution
ScheduledJobDispatcher resolves consumer: try keyed DI first, fallback to ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance
Throws if runAt is in the past
XML docs on interface method

userStories.title: Create StaleJobRecoveryService
userStories.notes: Stale one-time jobs are re-queued as Pending (same as recurring). If the handler fails again and exhausts retries, it will be marked Failed per existing retry logic.
userStories.description: Background service that polls ReleaseStaleJobsAsync at configurable interval. Add StaleJobThreshold (default 5min) and StaleJobCheckInterval (default 30s) to SchedulerOptions. Register alongside SchedulerBackgroundService. Both one-time and recurring stale jobs are re-queued as Pending.
acceptanceCriteria: StaleJobRecoveryService internal sealed BackgroundService in Core
Polls ReleaseStaleJobsAsync at configurable interval
StaleJobThreshold and StaleJobCheckInterval added to SchedulerOptions
Logs warning when stale jobs released
Only registered when IScheduledJobStorage present

userStories.title: Enforce execution timeout in SchedulerBackgroundService
userStories.notes: DefaultJobTimeout defaults to null (no timeout). Consumers opt-in via per-job Timeout or global DefaultJobTimeout.
userStories.description: Use CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter(timeout) per job. Fallback: job.Timeout ?? options.DefaultJobTimeout ?? no timeout. Add DefaultJobTimeout (TimeSpan?, default null) to SchedulerOptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Linked CancellationTokenSource with CancelAfter when timeout configured
DefaultJobTimeout (TimeSpan?, default null) added to SchedulerOptions
Fallback chain: job.Timeout -> options.DefaultJobTimeout -> no timeout
Timed-out jobs marked as failed execution with timeout error
OperationCanceledException from timeout treated as failure not shutdown

userStories.title: Validate scheduling-only mode
userStories.description: Ensure AddMessages works without transport. Transport-dependent processors skip when ITransport not registered. Bootstrapper handles missing transport gracefully.
acceptanceCriteria: AddMessages with storage + ScanConsumers works without transport
Transport-dependent processors skip gracefully when ITransport not registered
Bootstrapper does not crash without transport subscribers

userStories.title: Optimize ScheduledJobDispatcher with compiled delegates
userStories.description: Cache compiled handler factories in ScheduledJobDispatcher using FastExpressionCompiler. ConcurrentDictionary<string, Func<IServiceProvider, IConsume<ScheduledTrigger>>> cache. Fallback to keyed DI on compilation failure.
acceptanceCriteria: ConcurrentDictionary cache for compiled handler factories
First dispatch compiles factory via FastExpressionCompiler
Subsequent dispatches use cached factory
Fallback to keyed DI if compilation fails
Thread-safe cache population

userStories.title: Add MisfireStrategy to RecurringAttribute and ScheduledJob
userStories.notes: MisfireStrategy enum: FireImmediately (default, current behavior), SkipAndScheduleNext. MisfireThreshold on SchedulerOptions (default 1 min).
userStories.description: Add MisfireStrategy enum (FireImmediately, SkipAndScheduleNext) to Abstractions. Add MisfireStrategy property to RecurringAttribute (default FireImmediately), ScheduledJob entity, and ScheduledJobDefinition. Add MisfireThreshold (TimeSpan, default 1 min) to SchedulerOptions.
acceptanceCriteria: MisfireStrategy enum in Abstractions: FireImmediately (default), SkipAndScheduleNext
MisfireStrategy property (default FireImmediately) on RecurringAttribute
MisfireStrategy property on ScheduledJob entity
ScheduledJobDefinition carries misfire strategy from attribute to job during reconciliation
MisfireThreshold (TimeSpan, default 1 min) added to SchedulerOptions
XML docs on enum, properties, and option

userStories.title: Enforce misfire strategy in SchedulerBackgroundService
userStories.notes: Depends on US-045 (MisfireStrategy enum and properties must exist).
userStories.description: Before dispatching a job, check if now - NextRunTime > MisfireThreshold. If misfired and SkipAndScheduleNext: skip execution, compute next cron occurrence, update job, log warning. FireImmediately: execute normally (no change). Only applies to recurring jobs.
acceptanceCriteria: Before dispatch, check if now - job.NextRunTime > options.MisfireThreshold
If misfired and SkipAndScheduleNext: skip execution, compute next cron occurrence, update job, log warning
If FireImmediately: execute normally (current behavior)
Only applies to recurring jobs (one-time jobs always fire)
Log includes job name and next scheduled time

userStories.title: Add scheduler health checks
userStories.notes: Depends on US-017 (ReleaseStaleJobsAsync for stale count detection).
userStories.description: SchedulerHealthCheck implementing IHealthCheck. Healthy: storage reachable. Degraded: stale jobs exist (count > 0). Unhealthy: storage query throws. AddSchedulerHealthChecks() extension on IHealthChecksBuilder. Only registered when IScheduledJobStorage present.
acceptanceCriteria: SchedulerHealthCheck internal sealed class implementing IHealthCheck
Healthy: storage reachable via lightweight query
Degraded: stale jobs exist (count > 0)
Unhealthy: storage query throws
AddSchedulerHealthChecks() extension on IHealthChecksBuilder
Only registered when IScheduledJobStorage present
Reports stale count and storage latency in health check data

userStories.title: Add cron override from IConfiguration
userStories.notes: Config path: Messaging:Scheduling:Jobs:{Name}:CronExpression. Only cron expression is overridable.
userStories.description: SchedulerJobReconciler accepts IConfiguration via DI. Before using attribute cron, checks IConfiguration["Messaging:Scheduling:Jobs:{Name}:CronExpression"]. Config value takes precedence. Invalid config value logs error and falls back to attribute value.
acceptanceCriteria: SchedulerJobReconciler accepts IConfiguration via DI
Before using attribute cron, check IConfiguration for override
Config value takes precedence over attribute value
If config value is invalid cron, log error and fall back to attribute value
Only cron expression is overridable from config
XML docs explain the override mechanism

userStories.title: Create InMemoryScheduledJobStorage
userStories.description: In-memory IScheduledJobStorage in Headless.Messaging.InMemoryStorage. ConcurrentDictionary + lock for atomicity. All methods including ReleaseStaleJobsAsync and PurgeExecutionsAsync. Register via UseInMemoryStorage().
acceptanceCriteria: InMemoryScheduledJobStorage sealed class in Headless.Messaging.InMemoryStorage
Implements all IScheduledJobStorage methods including ReleaseStaleJobsAsync and PurgeExecutionsAsync
AcquireDueJobsAsync uses lock for atomicity
UpsertJobAsync matches by Name
Registered via UseInMemoryStorage() extension
Thread-safe via ConcurrentDictionary + lock

userStories.title: Implement new IScheduledJobStorage methods in PostgreSQL
userStories.description: Add ReleaseStaleJobsAsync and PurgeExecutionsAsync to PostgreSqlScheduledJobStorage. Parameterized SQL, return affected row count.
acceptanceCriteria: ReleaseStaleJobsAsync: UPDATE SET Status=Pending WHERE Status=Running AND LockedAt < threshold
PurgeExecutionsAsync: DELETE FROM job_executions WHERE CompletedAt < threshold
Both use parameterized queries
Both return affected row count

userStories.title: Unit tests for hardening features
userStories.description: Tests for StaleJobRecoveryService, execution timeout, ScheduleOnceAsync, compiled delegate cache, scheduling-only mode, misfire strategy, health checks, cron config override. NSubstitute, TestBase, AbortToken.
acceptanceCriteria: StaleJobRecoveryService: polling, release count logging, configurable threshold
Execution timeout: linked CTS, timeout-as-failure, fallback chain
ScheduleOnceAsync: creation, past-date rejection, runtime resolution via ActivatorUtilities
Compiled delegate cache: first-dispatch compilation, cache hit, thread safety
Scheduling-only mode: no transport, only storage + scheduler
Misfire strategy: SkipAndScheduleNext skips misfired job, FireImmediately executes normally
Health check: healthy/degraded/unhealthy states, storage reachability
Cron config override: IConfiguration takes precedence, invalid config falls back to attribute
NSubstitute mocks, TestBase, AbortToken, should_*_when_* naming

acceptanceCriteria: ReleaseStaleJobsAsync: stuck job recovered after threshold
PurgeExecutionsAsync: old executions deleted, recent retained
One-time job end-to-end: create -> execute -> complete
Scheduling-only mode: no transport, verify job execution
Testcontainers PostgreSQL
